info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hondo, or 25 miles east of Ruidoso, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hondo, San Patricio and Tinnie. This includes Highway 380 between Mile Markers 101 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
